attributes.action: More help for disabled students in higher education with course fees, rather than having to get a loan, that may not be able to get repayed due to problems finding jobs / companies that will employee graduates with disabilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More help for disabled students in higher education with course fees, rather than having to get a loan, that may not be able to get repayed due to problems finding jobs / companies that will employee graduates with disabilities, ensuring they graduate obtains a job other than "basic" admin duties rather than a network administrator or Technicain for example in a computing enviroment. 

Edit (Now NOT linked with the other petition refering to "non disabled" students getting the DSA)
